title.en: A Prayer and Supplication to the Vidyādhara Gurus of the Three Lineages1

text.en: The unchanging basic space of the ground is the dharmakāya Samantabhadra;
text.en-trans: zhi ying gyurmé chöku kuntuzang

text.en: Its appearances, saṃbhogakāya, are cloud-like formations, the wisdom of the five buddha families;
text.en-trans: zhi nang longku yeshe rik ngé trin

text.en: And the three emanated lineages2destined to benefit beings are the gurus of the mind lineage –
text.en-trans: drodul rik sum gonggyü lama la

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab char chen pob

text.en: The emanated vidyādharas: Garab Dorje, Śrī Siṃha,
text.en-trans: trulpé rigdzin garab shiri sing

text.en: Padmasambhava, who is the embodiment of all buddhas, Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: gyal kün ngowo pejung bimala

text.en: And the eight highly accomplished and powerful vidyādhara masters3–
text.en-trans: drubpé rigdzin tsal chang nam gyé la

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab char chen pob

text.en: The Dharma King Tri Songdetsen, and sons; Vairotsana, Namkhai Nyingpo, and other loyal subjects;
text.en-trans: chögyal yabsé bairo namnying bang

text.en: Dhātviśvarī, Queen of Space, and the other awakened ones, whose play is as five ḍākinī consorts,4
text.en-trans: ying chuk yum ngé namrol khandro nga

text.en: Together with the assembly of awareness-holders who have the fortune to receive the oral tradition –
text.en-trans: kabab nyengyü rigdzin tsok ché la

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab char chen pob

text.en: Omniscient father and [spiritual] son, Nyangrel Nyima Özer and Guru Chöwang;
text.en-trans: nyang gur künkhyen yabsé nga pen jé

text.en: Ngari Paṇchen, Jangdak, Dorje Thokme, Chöje Lingpa,
text.en-trans: jang dak dorjé tokmé chöjé ling

text.en: Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo,5and the rest – limitless emanations defying the imagination –
text.en-trans: khyentsé wang sok namrol samyé la

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab char chen pob

text.en: Unchanginglord of all buddha families – in essence you are all buddhas –
text.en-trans: gyurmégyal kün ngowo rik kyi dak

text.en: In these decadent times you were the protector of thesupreme vehicle’s long and short lineages.6
text.en-trans: nyikdü tek chok kater shedrub gön

text.en: You are the crown ornament of all who hold thevictory banner of the buddhas’ teaching7–
text.en-trans: tenpé gyaltsen dzin kün tsuk gi gyen

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab char chen pob

text.en: Sovereign, the very activity of Jamgön Khyentse,
text.en-trans: jamgön khyentsé trinlé rangwang gyur

text.en: Renowned as the omniscient Pema Yeshe Dorje;8
text.en-trans: künzik pema yeshe dorjé dang

text.en: And the emanation of Vairotsana, Trulshik Dharmamati –
text.en-trans: bairö namrol trulzhik dharmé tsen

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so trinlé char chen pob

text.en: A vessel for the oceanic ways of dharma in all their immensity,9
text.en-trans: rabjam chö tsul gyatsö nö du gyur

text.en: You are renowned as a veritable lion of the dharma of learning and accomplishment.10
text.en-trans: shedrub chö kyi sengé tsen gyi pü

text.en: Confirmed as the custodian of these teachings, you received the blessing of the wisdom mind transmission.
text.en-trans: chödak uk yung gong gyü jinlab tob

text.en: I supplicate you: please shower down a great rain of blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab chok ngö tsol

text.en: Supreme body, Mañjuśrī; speech, the deities of life;
text.en-trans: ku chok jampal sung chok tsé yi lha

text.en: Mind, Yangdak Heruka; quality, the various Guru cycles;
text.en-trans: tuk chok yangdak yönten lamé tsok

text.en: And supreme activity, Kīlaya – mind treasures, profound and vast –
text.en-trans: trinlé purpa zab yang gongpé ter

text.en: Deities of their oceanic maṇḍalas, I supplicate you!
text.en-trans: kyilkhor gyatsö tsok la solwa deb

text.en: With no desire for the tainted objects of saṃsāra,
text.en-trans: zakché khorwé yul la mi chakpar

text.en: Upholding the three sets of vows – the concordant condition of the path –
text.en-trans: lam gyi tünkyen dom sum nampar dak

text.en: And, having found an eye for study and reflection through fierce devotion and endeavor,
text.en-trans: dé tsön drakpö tö sam mik nyé né

text.en: May I devote myself to practice in peaceful isolation.
text.en-trans: zhiwé né su drub la zholwar shok

text.en: May I moisten the field of being, the primordial ground, with bodhicitta;
text.en-trans: zhi gyü changchub sem kyi zhingsa len

text.en: Plant the seeds of the four kāyas through the path of ripening and liberation;
text.en-trans: lam gyü mindrol ku zhi sabön teb

text.en: And perfect the signs of warmth on the path of the two stages
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam gyi drötak tarchin né

text.en: To reveal the resultant state, the innate and spontaneous state of a vidyādhara.
text.en-trans: dré gyü lhündrub rigdzin ngöngyur shok

text.en: Until that time, may there be no outer, inner, or secret obstacle
text.en-trans: nekab su yang dön nyi drubpa la

text.en: When accomplishing the twofold aim of self and other.
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé barché minjung zhing

text.en: With my life long and free of illness, may I accomplish everything I wish for,
text.en-trans: nemé tsering sam gu yizhin drub

text.en: And may the expression of awareness blaze forth as experience and realization.
text.en-trans: nyamtok rigpé tsal chen bar gyur chik

text.en: May all those with whom I’m karmically connected, whether positively or negatively, be they dead or alive,
text.en-trans: di la zang ngen ledrel shi sön kün

text.en: Come to recognize the seemingly terrifying appearances of the intermediate (bardo) state as the appearances of confusion;
text.en-trans: rangnang trulpa bardö jiktrak la

text.en: Realizing them to be their own self-display, may they experience them as ‘appearance, increase and attainment’
text.en-trans: rang ngoshé né nang ché tob sum gyi

text.en: And render evident the pure three kāyas.
text.en-trans: rangnang dakpé ku sum ngöngyur shok

text.en: The pure concentrated essences of the Vidyādhara Guru’s wisdom-heart
text.en-trans: rigdzin lamé tuk kyi dangmé chü

text.en: Are the sublime dharmas of his pure and profound mind treasures.
text.en-trans: chö chok drimé zabmo gongpé ter

text.en: May they spread throughout the entire world and be well received,
text.en-trans: jikten künkhyab kün kyang nö gyur né

text.en: Bringing everyone, directly and indirectly, to the state of an awareness-holder.
text.en-trans: ngö gyü rigdzin sa la uk yung shok

text.en: May the decline and shortcomings of this world and its inhabitants be arrested.
text.en-trans: nöchü güpé nyé tsok kün zhi zhing

text.en: May longevity, merit, charisma, wind-horse, experience and spiritual realization increase.
text.en-trans: tsesö wang lung nyamtok ngang gi gyé

text.en: May the wind-mind of all who rank highly within the three realms be brought under control,
text.en-trans: kham sum chegü lungsem rangwang dü

text.en: And usher in the auspiciousness that is liberation from all adversity, hostility and obstructing forces.
text.en-trans: mitün dragek yong drol tashi shok
